channel.title: posts on istvn.urbn
channel.description: Recent content in posts on istvn.urbn

item.title: obscure formats
item.description: What does going to absurd lengths to watch an old DVD teach you?

item.title: down the coffee spiral
item.description: GAS has made me start a cult where my colleagues think I'm a barista and my manager thinks I'm Guy Fawkes.

item.title: way to boshan
item.description: How Tamás Sajó made me realise that my old "poems" were just teenage angst.

item.title: quarter of debloat
item.description: I consider myself a minimalist, but my digital clutter says otherwise.

item.title: after the snap
item.description: I'm ready for a "New Year, New Me" - with a healthy dose of skepticism.

item.title: marginal success
item.description: Turns out I'm still better at tweaking the blog than writing posts.

item.title: v60 is the way
item.description: Who knew that a cup of coffee could smell like weed, taste like oatmeal, and cost as much as a lunch?

item.title: platform of choice
item.description: A post about admitting that I tinker with the backbone of my blog far too much.

item.title: kotty
item.description: A post about what happens when you taste something you did not expect and decide to write about it.

item.title: system upgrade
item.description: Seven years later, my MacBook Pro was starting to feel slow.

item.title: init
item.description: After countless years, I'm back to document my random adventures.
